original_text: And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.
korean_text: 무릇 이 규례를 행하는 자에게와 하나님의 이스라엘에게 평강과 긍휼이 있을지어다

sentences.original_text: And as many as walk according to this rule
sentences.korean_translation: 이 규칙에 따라 행하는 모든 사람에게

sentences.original_text: and upon the Israel of God
